title: (Thurs Early Bird) What Are Jobs Were Before The Show + We Play Another Round Of Elder vs. Millennial + Mailbag: Listener Is Worried To Ask Her Boyfriend About Getting Drinks With Co-Workers
itunes:title: (Thurs Early Bird) What Are Jobs Were Before The Show + We Play Another Round Of Elder vs. Millennial + Mailbag: Listener Is Worried To Ask Her Boyfriend About Getting Drinks With Co-Workers
description:
We started the day by talking about what our lives were like before we joined the show! We go around the room and say what our job was before joining the show. Plus, we play another round of Elder vs. Millennial - questions based on your age and generation. The oldest on the show, Eddie, faces birthday girl Morgan2! Mailbag: A listener wants to go out to drinks with one of her guy friends and co-workers but is worried it will make her boyfriend upset. We share our thoughts if we think it's okay for her to grab drinks with a guy friend.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
